thread.title: Pathemari's moving trailer
thread.title_full: Pathemari's moving trailer - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Pathemari's moving trailer
text:
Filmmaker Salim Ahmed's second outing with Mammootty, after Kunjananthante Kada, is all set to hit big screens.
The film is titled Pathemari and it's moving trailer was recently released. It's an account of Malayali's 50 years of migration to the Middle East, and is told through the life of Pallikkal Narayanan, played by Mammootty.
